name: Getty: Fetch triples of geographical names
description:
This preset fetches all triples (turtle) associated with one or more entries from the [Getty Thesaurus of Geographic Names Online (TGN)](https://www.getty.edu/research/tools/vocabularies/tgn/). To start add a Getty ID as seed node, e.g., "7005903" for triples associated with Milan.

See our [Getting Started with Triple Parsing](https://github.com/strohne/Facepager/wiki/Getting-Started-with-Triple-Parsing) for a full walk through this preset.
